WePay | YCS09 | Redwood City, CA | Senior Software Engineers, Distributed Systems & Data Infrastructure | VISA | ONSITE

We’re looking for Software Engineers to help us build state-of-the-art, highly available and scalable systems with high levels of accuracy. We are currently focusing on building out our next-generation platform based on the following technologies:

- distributed graph - robust WAL (write-ahead log) - event sourcing via asynchronous streams

WePay helps online platforms increase revenue through integrated payments processing under their own name. We’ve uniquely enabled more than 1,000 platforms including Constant Contact, GoFundMe, and Meetup to incorporate payments without compromising on their user experience or taking on risk and regulatory exposure.

Any questions, email miller [at] wepay [dot] com - OR - Apply at https://go.wepay.com/careers

Will relocate to the San Francisco Bay Area/Silicon Valley
